name: Cowrywise
headline: Digitizing wealth management in Africa
description: Cowrywise is a FinTech company democratizing access to premium financial services by making these services available to the mass market cheaply. We are leveraging technology and investment management to re-imagine how financial planning, savings and investment products are delivered to people. We do this by helping our customers achieve their savings and investments goals in a simple, secure and affordable manner.

# Put your money to work
## Invest wisely like damilolaoyindamolafunmilolaconsciencemoyosoluwa
[Start Investing](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/choose-account>)Start Investing
See how 1M+ customers are investing
## Get a little  richer each day
##### One small step today, a giant leap for tomorrow.
[Start building wealth](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/choose-account>)
###### Build your savings
Consistently automate your savings while setting realistic goals.
###### Invest deliberately
Invest in our diverse range of assets that grow in value over time.
###### Stay rich ‚ú®
Protect your wealth by managing risk, seeking advice and making smart financial decisions.
## You name it, we‚Äôve figured it out.
#### [Automate and build my savings](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/choose-account>)#### [Diversified long-term investing](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/choose-account>)#### [Get better returns on my money](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/choose-account>)#### [Invest my business‚Äô cash](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/sprout>)#### [Invest in mutual funds easily](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/choose-account>)#### [Invest with very low fees](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/choose-account>)

## It takes 5 minutes
Create an account
Sign up for an account with your name, email and phone number.
Add a payment method
Using your debit card or a bank transfer, setup your first plan.
Watch your money grow
Sit back, relax & let your money work for you all day, everyday.
[Sign up now](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/choose-account>)

## Keeping your money safe is our business.
Trust is our currency. We are committed to the security of your money and the protection of your account.
[Learn More](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/security>)
##### Top-Notch Security
We use industry-standard encryption technology to protect user data. We also use two-factor authentication to verify all customer accounts, so you can be sure that your funds are safe and secure.
##### Assets Custody
Our users‚Äô financial assets are held with a licensed custodian, Zenith Nominees Limited, for safekeeping to prevent misappropriation, misuse, theft, and/or loss, and in accordance with applicable law.
##### Regulatory Compliance
Cowrywise is a duly registered fund manager with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) of Nigeria. All our activities are in full compliance with regulatory requirements to the ultimate protection of our clients.
##### Best-In-Class Assets
All the investment options listed on Cowrywise, are carefully screened, managed by professional fund managers. All the diverse mutual funds registered with the SEC, with standard third-party custodian structure.
###### WHY COWRYWISE ?
Licenced and regulated?Yup!
99% service uptime?Yup!
Great interest rates?Yup!
Diversified investment portfolio?Sure!
Secured savings? Bet!
Convinced?[Sign up now.](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/choose-account>)

Licensed by the SECFund Manager
Cowrywise Financial Technology Limited (‚ÄúCowrywise‚Äù) is a Fund/Portfolio Manager duly licensed by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) of Nigeria, with License #1940 and its sister company, CFTL Digital Services Limited, is a Digital Sub-Broker duly licensed by the SEC, with License #3005.
Our mutual funds are managed by our fund management partners and made available to our clients through our web and mobile applications. The fund manager for each mutual fund is disclosed on every mutual fund‚Äôs profile page. Any historical returns or expected returns are hypothetical in nature and may not reflect actual future performance. [View full list of available mutual funds on Cowrywise.](https://cowrywise.com/<https:/cowrywise.com/mutual-funds>)
Stash is used for the purpose of receiving money transfers in place of a regular debit card. It also receives the proceeds from the sale of any mutual fund on Cowrywise.

generated_description:
Cowrywise is a forward-thinking FinTech company based in Lagos, Nigeria, on a mission to democratize wealth management across Africa. Founded in 2017, Cowrywise emerged from the esteemed Y Combinator Batch S18 and has grown to a dynamic team of 40 employees. Their goal? To make premium financial services accessible and affordable to the mass market, leveraging technology and investment management to transform how savings, investments, and financial planning are delivered.

At its heart, Cowrywise is about simplifying the financial journey for its users. They offer a range of services that enable customers to save, invest, and grow their wealth with ease. For individuals, Cowrywise provides tools for financial planning, competitive saving options with better interest rates than traditional banks, and the ability to build a global investment portfolio right from an app. The platform includes various features tailored for both personal users and businesses, allowing users to make their idle cash work harder through services like Sprout‚Äîdesigned for businesses to put excess funds to productive use.

Security is a priority for Cowrywise. They are fully licensed by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) of Nigeria, ensuring that their operations comply with all regulatory standards. To safeguard user data and funds, Cowrywise employs industry-standard encryption and offers two-factor authentication, further cementing trust with their clientele.

The company‚Äôs user-friendly platform is designed to get users started in just five minutes. Once set up, users can sit back and let their money work for them, supported by robust investment options managed by experienced professionals.

Cowrywise embodies the spirit of innovation in finance, focusing not only on access but also on the education of their users. Their learning resources, including glossaries and blogs, help demystify finance and promote smart money management.

In summary, Cowrywise is a transformative force in Africa‚Äôs financial landscape, committed to helping clients of all backgrounds achieve their financial goals with simplicity, security, and exceptional service. Check them out at [cowrywise.com](https://cowrywise.com).
